[Euless City Council](https://www.eulesstx.gov/city-hall/euless-city-council)





Council Member Eddie Price
--------------------------

#### Term expires: May 2028

**Phone:**
817-685-1411, ext. 3 |
**Email:**
[place3@eulesstx.gov](https://forms.eulesstx.gov/Forms/CouncilContact?Contact=place3@eulesstx.gov)

![Place 3 Eddie Price](https://www.eulesstx.gov/home/showpublishedimage/6950/638427377339670000)
Eddie Price is a Principal with KBKG, Inc. He is a certified member of the American Society of Cost Segregation Professionals, and is currently serving as President of this organization.

He became a resident of Euless in 1992. Prior to being elected to City Council, he served for many years on the Zoning Board of Adjustment and is a past graduate of the Euless Citizens Fire & Police Academy.

Eddie is also a past President of the Morrisdale Neighborhood Association and served for ten years as Treasurer of Career Workshops, Inc., a non-profit, faith-based organization which helps job seekers in career transition identify and manage career issues.

Eddie is an active member of Cross City Church. He also supports several local ministries, including serving on the board of 6 Stones Mission Network.

He and his wife, Kay, have been married for over 40 years and are blessed with six children and seven grandchildren. Eddie enjoys reading, writing, drawing, and “fixing” things.

The City of Euless, TX
